summary: This code defines a Jina Flow with a specific port and includes an executor named "toyExecutor" using the configuration from "executor1/config.yml".

details.comment: This code defines a Jina Flow with a specific port and includes an executor named "toyExecutor" using the configuration from "executor1/config.yml".
details.content:
jtype: Flow
version: '1'
with:
  port: 54321
executors:
  - uses: executor1/config.yml
    name: toyExecutor
